biotools.summary: Software which calculates the ‘mosaicity’ of a one dimensional hybrid zone. This package uses likelihood to fit step-wise models to one dimensional hybrid zone data, and to estimate the ‘mosaicity’ of the hybrid zone.

bioschemas.name: mosaic
bioschemas.summary: Software which calculates the ‘mosaicity’ of a one dimensional hybrid zone. This package uses likelihood to fit step-wise models to one dimensional hybrid zone data, and to estimate the ‘mosaicity’ of the hybrid zone.
